summary: This header file defines the logging interface for the mod_md module in Apache HTTP Server, including log levels, logging functions, and callback mechanisms. It provides a comprehensive logging infrastructure for certificate management operations through the ACME protocol.

logs.reason: This macro formats log numbers with an 'AH' prefix followed by the log number and a colon. Used throughout the mod_md module to provide consistent log message formatting with unique identifiers.
logs.resolution: This is part of the logging infrastructure and not an actual log message. No resolution required.
